movie.title: The King and I
movie.description_intro: Set in 1860s Bangkok, the musical tells the story of the unconventional and tempestuous relationship that develops between the King of Siam and Anna, a British schoolteacher whom the modernist King, in an imperialistic world, brings to Siam to teach his many wives and children.
movie.description_full: Set in 1860s Bangkok, the musical tells the story of the unconventional and tempestuous relationship that develops between the King of Siam and Anna, a British schoolteacher whom the modernist King, in an imperialistic world, brings to Siam to teach his many wives and children.

movies.title: Georgy Girl
movies.summary: A homely but vivacious young woman dodges the amorous attentions of her father's middle-aged employer while striving to capture some of the glamorous life of her swinging London roommate.
movies.description_full: A homely but vivacious young woman dodges the amorous attentions of her father's middle-aged employer while striving to capture some of the glamorous life of her swinging London roommate.
movies.synopsis: A homely but vivacious young woman dodges the amorous attentions of her father's middle-aged employer while striving to capture some of the glamorous life of her swinging London roommate.

movies.title: Arbor Demon
movies.summary: An adventurous woman with a secret from her husband insists the couple go camping to reconnect. Something in the woods wipes out a group of hunters nearby, preventing the couple from leaving their tent. Secrets and supernatural stories come to light, and they must determine if the real threat is inside or outside their enclosure.

Secrets and supernatural stories come to light, and they must determine if the real threat is inside or outside their enclosure.

movies.title: Firebrand
movies.summary: The ups and downs of modern-day relationship take the spotlight in this contemporary, slice-of-life story.
movies.description_full: The ups and downs of modern-day relationship take the spotlight in this contemporary, slice-of-life story.
movies.synopsis: The ups and downs of modern-day relationship take the spotlight in this contemporary, slice-of-life story.

movies.title: The Wall
movies.summary: A woman inexplicably finds herself cut off from all human contact when an invisible, unyielding wall suddenly surrounds the countryside. Accompanied by her loyal dog Lynx, she becomes immersed in a world untouched by civilization and ruled by the laws of nature.
